name: Life Engine
description:
Made for the "Academia Unity Game Jam 1". The project is about a boy who grows up in the upgrades of life, learning about taking damage, using his mind to jump, killing cockroaches, and more. This boy learns that there are many gaming points in our life and he is going through all of them, so that one day he can become a game developer!

Credits:

Anna Beatriz Nakai Ricchetti - UI/UX.

Arthur H. C. Sousa - Programmer.

Camille Regel - 2D Animator, Character Design.

Christian Felipone - 2D Animator, Character Design.

Manoel Bacal - 2d enviroment artist, Game Producer, Game Designer Assistant, Soundtrack, Level designer.

Pedro Silva - 2D Environment Artist, Game Producer, Game Designer Assistant, Sound Designer, Title Designer.
